dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4869 IH: Freedom to Compete Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Williams of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14267 (relating to reducing anti-competitive regulatory barriers).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Freedom to Compete Act of 2025.
Executive Order 14267 (90 Fed. Reg. 15629; relating to reducing anti-competitive regulatory barriers) shall have the force and effect of law.
